I've just build a Drag and Drop Template consisting of all custom modules; the markup and styles of which are all reliant on Bootstrap 4 - is there a way to make it so HubSpot's Bootstrap 2 implementation doesn't conflict with my Bootstrap 4 markup/styles?
Or have it not add all the .row-fluid-wrapper and .row-fluid -- I just want to use "modules" like I would use an include with a static site generator - am I thinking about this wrong?
You can create a .html template and paste each individual module code into it. It’s found in the bottom right of the module pane. I’d screenshot but I’m on my mobile.
